Articles.Content:
I\'m new to KSP, but I\'ve built a few rockets and achieved a few orbits already ;P

The community looks great here, and has a great game to compliment it. So hello guys!

(PS: Any tips on how to achieve Mun orbit?)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Search the forums for video tutorials on how to get to the Mun and back. There are a few.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
